name: Pixiland: Age of Heroes
description: Pixiland is a strategy game that combines village building, hero collection and dungeon exploration. Players take on the role of a leader of a community, developing the village, recruiting heroes.

contracts.label: Daily Check-in Contract Address
contracts.description: The smart contract address on the blockchain used for the daily check-in feature in the Pixiland game, allowing players to record their attendance each day.

contracts.label: In-Game Item Payment Processing Contract
contracts.description: The smart contract address responsible for processing payments for in-game item purchases in Pixiland, including transaction verification and secure item delivery.

contracts.label: Pixiland Genesis Pass NFT Contract
contracts.description: The smart contract address for the Pixiland Genesis Pass NFT. Players who own this NFT will receive exclusive benefits and special privileges in the Pixiland game.
